short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Scrape data from any site into a spreadsheet

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
✨ SCRAPE DATA FROM ANY SITE INTO A SPREADSHEET ✨

Spreadsheetify is an AI-powered Chrome plugin that groups similar data types from a website and organizes them into an editable SheetRocks spreadsheet.

HOW IT WORKS
1. Add a header and click on the first two elements of data
2. Repeat for as many columns as you want
3. Instantly open your data in a powerful SheetRocks workbook

The data does not need to be tabular–it works with any repeating pattern.

WHAT IT CAN DO
• Web research / data collection
• Pricing / marketplace analytics
• Real estate research
• Overkill hobby analytics (fantasy football, Magic the Gathering, etc)
• Transfer a list or table into a spreadsheet
